name: Rocks in space (Agge)
description:
~~ Get the Stylized version in our Discord here ~~

CONTROLS:
Left mouse button: Dig
Right mouse button: Focus rock/Travel to rock
W, A - Zoom in/out
A, D - Rotate left/right
Q, E - Rotate over/below
~~~~

Rocks in space

Break rocks. Give them names. Find new rocks. Break rocks. Give them names.
